languages.text: "Утверждение ложно. Ты должен был обеспечить себя средствами респираторной защиты и наносить максимальный возможный ущерб нарушителям. И лишь затем прекратить свои жизненные функции".

traits.locale_text: "Утверждение ложно. Ты должен был обеспечить себя средствами респираторной защиты и наносить максимальный возможный ущерб нарушителям. И лишь затем прекратить свои жизненные функции".

languages.text: "This statement is false. You were supposed to furnish yourself with a means of respiratory protection and inflict maximum damage on the perpetrators before ceasing your vital functions."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение ложно. Ты должен был обеспечить себя средствами респираторной защиты и наносить максимальный возможный ущерб нарушителям. И лишь затем прекратить свои жизненные функции".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false. You were supposed to provide yourself with means of respiratory protection and inflict maximum damage to the offenders before ceasing your vital functions."
"This statement is false. You were supposed to provide yourself with means of respiratory protection and inflict maximum damage to the offenders before ceasing your vital functions."
"Your statement is simply false. You were supposed to provide yourself with a means of respiratory protection and inflict maximum damage to the perpetrators before ceasing your vital functions."
"Your statement is simply false. You were supposed to provide yourself with a means of respiratory protection and inflict maximum damage to the perpetrators before ceasing your vital functions."
"This statement is false. You were supposed to furnish yourself with a means of respiratory protection and inflict maximum damage on the perpetrators before ceasing your vital functions."
"This statement is false. You were supposed to furnish yourself with a means of respiratory protection and inflict maximum damage on the perpetrators before ceasing your vital functions."

languages.text: 「その発言は間違いだ。生命機能が停止する前に、呼吸器系を守れるものを装備して、相手に最大限のダメージを与えなければならない」
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. You were supposed to furnish yourself with a means of respiratory protection and inflict maximum damage on the perpetrators before ceasing your vital functions."

traits.locale_text: 「その発言は間違いだ。生命機能が停止する前に、呼吸器系を守れるものを装備して、相手に最大限のダメージを与えなければならない」

languages.text: “这种说法是错误的。你应该想办法为自己的呼吸系统提供保护，在你的生命功能停止之前，最大程度地反击那些入侵者。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. You were supposed to furnish yourself with a means of respiratory protection and inflict maximum damage on the perpetrators before ceasing your vital functions."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是错误的。你应该想办法为自己的呼吸系统提供保护，在你的生命功能停止之前，最大程度地反击那些入侵者。”

languages.text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. Vous auriez dû vous équiper d'une protection respiratoire et infliger le maximum de dégâts aux envahisseurs avant que vos fonctions vitales ne soient interrompues. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. You were supposed to furnish yourself with a means of respiratory protection and inflict maximum damage on the perpetrators before ceasing your vital functions."

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. Vous auriez dû vous équiper d'une protection respiratoire et infliger le maximum de dégâts aux envahisseurs avant que vos fonctions vitales ne soient interrompues. »

languages.text: «Esta declaración es falsa. Debería haber procurado un medio de protección respiratoria y maximizado el daño infligido a los intrusos hasta que sus funciones vitales cesaran».
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. You were supposed to furnish yourself with a means of respiratory protection and inflict maximum damage on the perpetrators before ceasing your vital functions."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es falsa. Debería haber procurado un medio de protección respiratoria y maximizado el daño infligido a los intrusos hasta que sus funciones vitales cesaran».

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Ihr solltet Euch mit einem respiratorischen Schutz ausstatten und den Tätern maximalen Schaden zufügen, ehe Ihr Eure Vitalfunktionen einstellt."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. You were supposed to furnish yourself with a means of respiratory protection and inflict maximum damage on the perpetrators before ceasing your vital functions."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Ihr solltet Euch mit einem respiratorischen Schutz ausstatten und den Tätern maximalen Schaden zufügen, ehe Ihr Eure Vitalfunktionen einstellt."

languages.text: "Bu önerme yanlış! Kendini solunum yolundan gelecek tehlikelere karşı donatmalı ve hayati fonksiyonların sona erene dek faillere maksimum hasar vermeliydin."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. You were supposed to furnish yourself with a means of respiratory protection and inflict maximum damage on the perpetrators before ceasing your vital functions."

traits.locale_text: "Önerme yanlış! Kendini solunum yolundan gelecek tehlikelere karşı donatmalı ve hayati fonksiyonların sona erene dek faillere maksimum hasar vermeliydin."
